item.title: Akilah add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "When I said I would die a bachelor, I did not think I should live till I were married." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Akilah add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Akilah add a quote by Stéphane Mallarmé
item.description: "Everything in the world exists in order to end up as a book." -- Stéphane Mallarmé

item.title: Akilah add a quote by James Baldwin
item.description: "You think your pain and your heartbreak are unprecedented in the history of the world, but then you read." -- James Baldwin

item.title: Akilah add a quote by Katherine Applegate
item.description: "A good zoo," Stella said, "is a large domain. A wild cage. A safe place to be. It has room to roam and humans who don't hurt." She pauses, considering her words. "A good zoo is how humans make amends." -- Katherine Applegate

item.title: Akilah add a quote by Katherine Applegate
item.description: "They think I'm too old to cause trouble. Old age is a powerful disguise." -- Katherine Applegate

item.title: Akilah add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "What really knocks me out is a book that, when you're all done reading it, you wish the author that wrote it was a terrific friend of yours and you could call him up on the phone whenever you felt like it. That doesn't happen much, though." -- J.D. Salinger
